thread.title: Disney Visa® Cardmember-Exclusive Star Wars™ Imperial Meet ‘N’ Greet Coming Soon
thread.title_full: Disney Visa® Cardmember-Exclusive Star Wars™ Imperial Meet ‘N’ Greet Coming Soon

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Disney Visa® Cardmember-Exclusive Star Wars™ Imperial Meet ‘N’ Greet Coming Soon
text:
Request a Quote Disney Visa® Cardmember-Exclusive Star Wars™ Imperial Meet ‘N’ Greet Coming Soon 
Disney Visa® Cardmembers have always received a host of amazing vacation perks when visiting the Walt Disney World® and Disneyland® Resorts as well as other Disney Destinations. But now, that list of perks is getting longer! 
Soon, Disney Visa® Cardmembers on both coasts will be able to experience the Star Wars™ Imperial Meet ‘N’ Greet! Inside, Cardmembers and up to 5 guests will feel the force as they meet favorite Star Wars™ characters at a private location. The Star Wars™ Imperial Meet ‘N’ Greet will be available in addition to the Disney Character Meet ‘N’ Greet photo opportunities that already take place inside Disney California Adventure® Park and Epcot® . 
Star Wars™ Imperial Meet ‘N’ Greet will open in Disneyland® Park this Fall and inside Disney’s Hollywood Studios® in early 2016. Cardmembers can also explore three new Star Wars™ -themed card designs now available to order. 
Separate Theme Park admission required for each Meet ‘N’ Greet Opportunity. Must present a valid Disney Visa® Credit Card for entry for up to 6 people per cardmember account (each cardmember account may be used for entry only one time per day). Operating times, days of the week, locations and appearance of Characters may vary and are subject to restrictions and change or cancellation without notice. Please contact your Magic Maker® or visit your cardmember page for additional information.
